title: Toxic player behaviour ranked punishment
body:
Ok so hear me, I think a fair way to punish players for being toxic, especially higher elo players who (in my opinion) should help newer/lower elo players understand the game, would be to lower LP gain for every verified toxic report made against an account (for a period of time).

Obviously this wouldn't prevent players in normal games being toxic; however, I believe a lot of players would avoid being toxic if they knew they could lost their precious LP, purely because they were being rude to another player.

replies.body:
This would require manually going through reports and doing something to actually punish players. 

And there would be a lot of reports to go through to do that.
